author: Defold
description: Retrieve an advertising identifier for a device or user. Advertisers use this to id so they can deliver customized advertising. The id is used for tracking and identifying a user (without revealing personal information). On iOS this extension also supports the App Tracking Transparency framework.
name: Ad Info

releases.message: FIX: Upgraded Android gradle dependency config to be compatible with Gradle 7.x
FIX: Don't add `NSUserTrackingUsageDescription` key to Info.plist if value is not present in game.project

NEW: Support for iOS 14 Tracking Transparency
NEW: Support for iOS 11.3 SkAdNetwork registerAppForAdNetworkAttribution
NEW: adinfo.get() is now asynchronous and takes a callback function as argument
FIX: Added library path to game.project so that this project can work as a library dependency
